WorkItem.Description:
The item database and its filters seems to have gone downhill since arena season 8 :-
When browsing Slot:Gear
The Wrathful * items from arena season 8 are not showing up at all even with all filters (except the gem exclude filters) enabled.
The arena season 7 items do show up in the gear list, but the filter to enable them is "Other" rather than PvP.
When browsing Slot:Gems
I don't understand why epic crafted gems are now under the "Other" filter.

Comments.Message: Did I not mention that updating the item cache was a step I performed. Without the update the S7 items wern't showing up.

Update your item cache



** Closed by Jothay 5/11/2010 2:29 PM

1. "Update Item Cache" explicitly states in the message that it does NOT add any new items.
2. I did an Update Item Cache anyway.
3. The missing items did not appear.
4. I also see that Rawr 2.3.15 is ALSO missing the ilvl 264 Lasherweave set. I have some Sanctified Lasherweave items on my feral druid. As the "source" on the tooltip Rawr merely says "Not Found on Armory".

It seems to be hit a miss on the Wrathful items, some modules show them and some (Druid at least) do not. Loading upgrades from Armoury and/or Wowhead does make most of these items show up, however it also loads the generic placeholders such as Arena 5 Healing belt and LK Honor 6 Nuking boots.

The item cache, source and filters have all been updated for Rawr's next release.  Checking every single item for accuracy is a very time consuming process, so at the time of 2.3.15's release, I was only able to make sure all the missing items were added.  This next release will have all the sources updated and everything filtering correctly.
